title: Wearables: The Empowering Uses of Data
itunes:title: Wearables: The Empowering Uses of Data
description: As Daniel Shaw, VP, Consumer Innovation Products at CVS Health tells us, "At the end of the day it's how you use this data. How are you looking at this data? In what ways are you interpreting it? And then ultimately getting to a place where you can make actual decisions on it.”  He also explains how the voice-activated Symphony ecosystem and the Attain app can help encourage both proactive and preventative behaviors.
author: CVS Health
itunes:author: CVS Health
